reviewText:
Watched this DVD and got hooked to go to Alaska in our 19 foot Roadtrek Class B RV.  Used their tips and itinerary to make up our own trip plan.  Went to Alaska the summer of 2013 and loved it as much as the Howen's!  Take this DVD and your Milepost and go.
Linda Gillen, Punta Gorda, FL

We watched with expectations for good tips and we were quite pleased. We will not be going to some of the places they did, but the tips on driving with an RV were very helpful. We know what to expect now. Thanks!
